channel.title: Ne Plus Inutile
channel.description: The World's Worst Podcast. The title is very bad Latin for "nothing more useless", which is a pretty good description of this podcast with no discernable focus and only occasional updates. 1 star.
channel.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
channel.itunes:subtitle: Ne Plus Inutile is very bad Latin for "nothing more useless".
channel.itunes:summary: The World's Worst Podcast. "Ne Plus Inutile" is very bad Latin for "nothing more useless", which is a pretty good description of this podcast with no discernable focus and only occasional updates.

item.title: Episode 2: Muttering in the Morning
item.description: I had some time before leaving for work.
item.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
item.itunes:subtitle: I had some time before leaving for work.
item.itunes:summary: I had some time before leaving for work.

item.title: Episode 1: Just Taking Up Space
item.description: Think of this as the podcast equivalent of clearing one's throat.
item.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
item.itunes:subtitle: Think of this as the podcast equivalent of clearing one's throat.
item.itunes:summary: Think of this as the podcast equivalent of clearing one's throat.

item.title: Episode 0: What's In The Box, Frank?
item.description: The superhero origin story of Ne Plus Inutile, at least until "Crisis on Infinite Storage" (description).
item.itunes:author: James P. Goltz
item.itunes:subtitle: The superhero origin story of Ne Plus Inutile, at least until "Crisis on Infinite Storage" (itunes subtitle).
item.itunes:summary: The superhero origin story of Ne Plus Inutile, at least until "Crisis on Infinite Storage" (itunes summary).
